com.sustech.snappat.CameraActivity.env

类 BorderedText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sustech.snappat.CameraActivity.env.BorderedText

  • public class BorderedText
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that encapsulates the tedious bits of rendering legible, bordered text onto a canvas.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BorderedText(float textSize)
      Creates a left-aligned bordered text object with a white interior, and a black exterior with the specified text size.
      BorderedText(int interiorColor, int exteriorColor, float textSize)
      Create a bordered text object with the specified interior and exterior colors, text size and alignment.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      float getTextSize()

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BorderedText

        public BorderedText(float textSize)
        Creates a left-aligned bordered text object with a white interior, and a black exterior with the specified text size.
        参数:
        textSize - text size in pixels

      • BorderedText

        public BorderedText(int interiorColor,
                    int exteriorColor,
                    float textSize)
        Create a bordered text object with the specified interior and exterior colors, text size and alignment.
        参数:
        interiorColor - the interior text color
        exteriorColor - the exterior text color
        textSize - text size in pixels
